title: Mahnar (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
text:
Mahnar (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is an <a href="Vidhan%20Sabha">assembly</a> constituency in <a href="Vaishali%20district">Vaishali district</a> in the <a href="India">India</a>n <a href="States%20and%20territories%20of%20India">state</a> of <a href="Bihar">Bihar</a>.
Overview.
As per Delimitation of Parliamentary and Assembly constituencies Order, 2008, No. 129 Mahnar (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is composed of the following: Mahnar <a href="Community%20Development%20Block%20in%20India">community development block</a>; Borhan urf Rasulpur Gaus, Basantpur, Mohiuddinpur Garahi, Harprasad, Mahipura, Sohrathi, Mahisaur, Chandsarai, Dihbuchauli, Peerapur, Rasalpur Purushottam, Bishunpur Bedauliya, Saiyad Mahammad urf Salha, Khopi, Arniyan, Hazrat Jandaha, Bahsi Saidpur, Mukundpur Bhath and <a href="Loma%20%28Jandaha%29">Loma</a> <a href="gram%20panchayat">gram panchayat</a>s of Jandaha community development block.
Mahnar (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is part of No. 21 <a href="Hajipur%20%28Lok%20Sabha%20constituency%29">Hajipur (Lok Sabha constituency)</a> (SC).
Election results.
1977-2010.
In the <a href="2010%20Bihar%20legislative%20assembly%20election">2010 state assembly elections</a>, Dr. Achyuatanand of <a href="Bharatiya%20Janata%20Party">BJP</a> won the Mahnar assembly seat defeating Rama Kishor Singh of <a href="Lok%20Janshakti%20Party">LJP</a>. Contests in most years were multi cornered but only winners and runners are being mentioned. Rama Kishore Singh of <a href="Lok%20Janshakti%20Party">LJP</a> defeated Munshilal Rai of RJD in <a href="Bihar%20Assembly%20Election%2C%20Oct%202005">October 2005</a> and <a href="Bihar%20Assembly%20Election%2C%20Feb%202005">February 2005</a>. Rama Kishore Singh of JD(U) defeated Munshilal Rai of RJD in 2000. Munshilal Rai of <a href="Janata%20Dal">JD</a> defeated Rama Kishore Singh, Independent, in 1995. Muneshwar Prasad Singh of SOP(L) defeated Raghupati of JD in 1985. Munshilal Rai of <a href="Lok%20Dal">LD</a> defeated Mithleshwar Prasad of <a href="Indian%20National%20Congress">Congress</a> in 1985. Munshilal Rai of Janata Party (Secular – Charan Singh) defeated Ram Prasad Singh of Congress in 1980. Munshwar Prasad Singh of <a href="Janata%20Party">JP</a> defeated Akhilesh Kumar Ray of Congress in 1977.
2015 and 2020.
In 2015 <a href="Janata%20Dal%20%28United%29">Janata Dal (United)</a> deflected from the <a href="National%20Democratic%20Alliance">National Democratic Alliance</a> and allied with its chief rival <a href="Rashtriya%20Janata%20Dal">Rashtriya Janata Dal</a> to form a Grand Alliance called Mahagathbandhan. In the elections to Mahnar constituency in 2015 <a href="Umesh%20Kushwaha">Umesh Kushwaha</a> of JD (U) defeated Achyuthanand Singh with a large margin of 27000 votes. However, in 2020 Umesh Kushwaha lost to Bina Devi, the wife of <a href="Rama%20Kishor%20Singh">Rama Kishor Singh</a> who contested the 2020 election on <a href="Rashtriya%20Janata%20Dal">Rashtriya Janata Dal</a> symbol.
